home.headline: Crafting Digital Experiences, One Line of Code at a Time.
home.intro: Hello! I'm Eugene, a full-stack developer based in Minsk. I design and build beautiful, functional web applications.
home.philosophy: My approach is centered around creating intuitive user experiences backed by clean, efficient, and scalable code. I believe the best products are born from a passion for both design and technology.
home.skill1_desc: Building responsive and interactive user interfaces with modern technologies like React and Next.js.
home.skill2_desc: Designing robust server-side logic, APIs, and database structures using Node.js, Python, and SQL/NoSQL.
home.skill3_desc: Focusing on user-centric design principles to create engaging and easy-to-use digital products.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a passionate developer with a love for creating elegant solutions to complex problems. My journey in web development began with a simple 'Hello, World!' and has since grown into a full-fledged passion for building beautiful, high-performance digital experiences. I thrive in collaborative environments and am always eager to learn new technologies.

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.intro: Have a project in mind, a question, or just want to say hello? I'd love to hear from you. Fill out the form below and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.success_text: Thank you for reaching out. I'll be in touch shortly.

portfolio.title: My Work
portfolio.intro: Here are some of the projects I'm proud of. Each one was a unique challenge and a great learning experience. Hover over a card to see the details.
portfolio.project1_desc: A web platform created for direct interaction between beauty industry professionals and their clients. The solution includes artist profiles, work portfolios, an online booking system, and reviews. Developed with Next.js and Firebase to ensure high speed and scalability.
portfolio.project2_desc: An elegant catalog website for a designer lamp store. Implemented fast product search and filtering. Utilizes Server-Side Rendering (SSR) in Next.js for instant page loads and improved search engine indexing.
portfolio.project3_desc: A minimalist and interactive portfolio that highlights the designer's work. Smooth animations with Framer Motion and GSAP create an impressive user experience. The project is deployed on Firebase Hosting.
portfolio.project4_desc: A stylish portfolio. Responsive design and image optimization in Next.js ensure a perfect display on any device.
